{"id":359037295,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 9 months","timestamp":1593275757,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/359037295/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Perfect Squares","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int numSquares(int n) {\n        vector<int> dists(n + 1, INT_MAX);\n        dists[0] = 0; \n        for (int i = 1; i <= n/2; ++i) {\n            int plus = i * i; \n            for (int x = 0; x <= n; ++x) {\n                if (dists[x] != INT_MAX && x + plus <= n) {\n                    dists[x + plus] = min(dists[x + plus], dists[x] + 1); \n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return dists.back(); \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"perfect-squares"}
